desc: Combustible Gas Alarm: GasKnight professional Combustible Gas Detectors detect many explosive gases, including natural gas, propane, butane, LPG, LNG, etc. Get the best deals on Gas Detectors Alarms & Gas Monitors. Visit our website or Email us: hello@gasknight.com
